description: Contains logic and reasoning questions for interview evaluations.

question.description: The question text presented to the candidate.

level.description: Difficulty level of the question (1 = Intern, 6 = Expert).

tag_ids.description: References to associated tags in the logic_tags collection.

choices.description: List of answer choices (used only for multiple_choice type).

answer_explanation.description: Explanation or reasoning behind the correct answer.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the question was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of the last question update.

example.question: What is the next number in the sequence: 2, 4, 8, 16, ?
